metadata.title: CVE-2025-24530 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin 5.x before 5.2.2. An XSSvulnerability has been discovered for the check tables feature. A craftedtable or database name could be used for XSS.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
